participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i love taking bubble baths.
i'm single and with two dogs.
i do not drink alcohol.
i'm in my thirties.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
my wife left me and took my children.
i don't believe in god.
i'm overweight and unhappy.
i work at a nursing home.
i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.
2️⃣:
i've a pet fish.
my favorite color is orange.
i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset.
i turned 18 years old yesterday.
i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
